task_description:
You will now have a conversation with another Amazon Mechanical Turk Worker regarding the Article you just read.

Please discuss your feelings towards the article.

  • What was your first reaction from it?
  • What emotions did you get from it?

The conversation will last for 15 messages for each person (total of 30 messages).


Please be patient while we connect you to another worker.

If you have not been matched with a person in 10 minutes, we will pay you for your time taking the survey, including 10 minutes of wait time, at $15/hour

Important:

If you get disconnected or an error occurs, please copy and paste the exact error message into the AMT hit and you will still be paid.
